channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Justice Alito Also Flew An Insurrection Flag At His Beach House Last Summer
item.description: Supreme Court Justice Samuel Alito had his excuse for flying a flag supporting the insurrection shattered when it was reported that a different flag supporting Trump's insurrection flew at his beach house last summer.

item.title: Dutch Migration Crisis and the New Government’s Proposed Solutions
item.description: Like virtually every other Western nation, the Netherlands faces a mass migration crisis. As a result, last November saw Geert Wilders’ anti-mass-migration Party for Freedom (PVV) secure the most seats in the Dutch parliament. To read the rest of the article click here The post Dutch Migration Crisis and the New Government’s Proposed Solutions appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: RNC’s Election Integrity Lawyer Arraigned For Election Crimes
item.description: Christina Bobb, the RNC's election integrity lawyer, was arraigned on criminal charges related to the fake elector scheme in Arizona.

item.title: House Committee Holds Arizona Field Hearing on Biden Border Crisis
item.description: The House Judiciary Committee recently held a field hearing to examine the effects of the border crisis in Arizona. The hearing, titled “The Biden Border Crisis: Arizona Perspectives,” focused on testimony from law enforcement and Arizona residents. To read the rest of the article click here The post House Committee Holds Arizona Field Hearing on Biden Border Crisis appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Fani Willis Cites Appearance On Rachel Maddow In Primary Victory Speech
item.description: Fulton County DA Fani Willis was interviewed by Rachel Maddow the night before the Democratic primary and she cited her appearance on the show in her victory speech.

item.title: Reason Magazine Misses the Mark on Immigration Crisis
item.description: Last week Fiona Harrigan of Reason Magazine published a piece titled, “The U.S. Should Welcome Chinese Migrants.” To read the rest of the article click here The post Reason Magazine Misses the Mark on Immigration Crisis appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump Is Losing It As He Claims Fascists Are Prosecuting Him
item.description: Trump came up with the conspiracy theory that it is fascists who are controlling the Oval Office who are behind his prosecution.

item.title: Murderer from Colombia Released Into U.S. by ICE After Crossing Border Illegally
item.description: The recent arrest of Efrain Vidales Vargas, a convicted murderer from Colombia, is another example of the perilous consequences of the Biden administration’s failure to secure our borders. To read the rest of the article click here The post Murderer from Colombia Released Into U.S. by ICE After Crossing Border Illegally appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Legal Expert Says Robert Costello’s Cross Was A Kill Shot To Trump
item.description: Andrew Weissmann said on MSNBC that Robert Costello delivered a kill shot, but it was to Trump, not the prosecution.

item.title: New York Mayor Adam’s Botched Understanding of Merit-Based Immigration
item.description: Evidently impressed by the physical stamina of those who make it across the Rio Grande River, New York Mayor Eric Adams offered a novel idea for how to deal with his city’s migrant crisis. To read the rest of the article click here The post New York Mayor Adam’s Botched Understanding of Merit-Based Immigration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
